snippet: “The Maze Runner,” a young-adult dystopian story, finds a platoon of boys lost in a strange setting.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie The Maze Runner, directed by Wes Ball and starring Dylan O'Brien.
lead_paragraph: “The Maze Runner,” a young-adult dystopian story, finds a platoon of boys lost in a strange setting.

headline.seo: ‘The Maze Runner,’ Based on a Novel by James Dashner
headline.main: A Life-Size Labyrinth Is the Bane of These Boys
headline.print_headline: A Life-Size Labyrinth Is the Bane of These Boys
